name: Through the Night (itch)
description:
This game was made in ten days for the fireside game jam with the theme of Protect. You take on the task of protecting your campfire from dark things, so do your best to splat them and at the same time keep your fire burning bright to last the night!

controls can be found in the help section of the menu.

This being my first game jam game and third game ever I am very happy with it and i hope you enjoy!
